Reviews.Title: Warning: no audio outputs!
Reviews.Author: Tim Wallace
Reviews.Content: The other reviewers are saying that the sound is terrible on this unit.  They are correct, but their suggested solutions of using external speakers are not possible.  Despite the technical spec on Amazon showing "1 digital output" in fact there are no audio outputs at all, not even a headphone jack!  I just confirmed this with Samsung.  The support guy apologized for the total lack of audio outputs.  I'll be sending this one back, extremely rare for me!

Reviews.Title: Great picture - terrible sound
Reviews.Author: Carl from Alexandria
Reviews.Content: I'm a Samsung fan but very disappointed with this device.  The picture is great. 720p on a small screen looks like true HD.  But, we can't get past the terrible audio.  As a thin flat panel TV, the speakers are very small and fire down from the bottom of the TV.  There are no lower frequencies to speak of because of the nanometer sized speakers, regardless of the sound mode selected or the equalizer settings.  So the sound is very brassy.  Using the stand and sitting the TV on a hard surface, makes the high frequencies so brassy, the set is practically unlistenable.  We have the set sitting on a towel - which helps a little.  But we're very disappointed.  We're looking at using a small sound bar but we're saddened at the idea that we have to go to this additional expense to compensate for this deficiency.  If you're planning to simply use this TV for video and using another method for audio, the set is a great buy and I'd recommend it.  If you're planning to use the TV's speakers for audio, I suggest you look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: audio
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: yes the sound is bad. Kinda sounds like our phone answering machine. I think I'm gonna buy pc speakers for the set. I love the picture. We have a 37" sony and the sound is bad on it also. I think just about all these companies are installing shoddy speaker components.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV !!!
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV without prior viewing it in a store.  TV has a very nice picture at all angles, we placed it in our kitchen under the cabinet and it it looks great, the slim design is perfect. Sound is very good. We had to replace a COBY brand 15" TV that was struck by lightning, what a great upgrade.  I don't have anything negative to say.

Reviews.Title: Comparison of Samsung 19-inch LED Television with Toshiba and Insignia Models
Reviews.Author: Mantis
Reviews.Content: After twelve years of loyal service, our Sony 13-inch Trinitron analog television died of picture tube failure.  After proper burial rites, we researched all the new small televisions that would fit into our kitchen.  We first brought home a Samsung 19-inch LED TV (UN19D4003) because Consumer Reports said it had the best picture in its class.  It was rated at the top along with Toshiba.  Its sound was muffled, low volume and incomprehensible.  The speakers face backwards, towards the wall.  The Samsung was immediately returned to the store.  We needed good auditory qualities in a noisy kitchen.Next we listened to a side-by-side comparison of Insignia's 19-inch LED TV(NS-19E320A13) with Toshiba's 19-inch LED TV (19L4200U).  The Toshiba was by far louder and clearer with larger amplifiers.  The Toshiba's picture has less glare than the Samsung, easier on the eyes.  Toshiba has the Dynalight backlight.  We bought the Toshiba.The only drawback is the need for two remotes.  Our DIRECTV remote is needed to change channels, and the volume control is on the Toshiba remote.Update 9/20/12:  Remote control problem solved.  A telephone call to technical support got us through the steps of synchronizing the DirecTV remote with the new Toshiba television.  We didn't even need a technician to come to our house.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Viewing Angle
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Levine "Bob Levine"
Reviews.Content: Thought this set would be great in our bedroom but got a terrible surprise when I tried to install it.The viewing angle on my 26" and 32" Samsung LCD TV's is very wide. A great picture can be seen from above, below, and both sides.This 19" set had such a bad viewing angle that only looking at it straight on and even with the set yielded an acceptable picture.Returned it to the store within an hour.Expected a "bare bones" set in this size and price but not a useless one.Shame on you for this one, Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I like this TV works great, great quality picture and perfect size, i used at the kitchen and its perfect, I'll get another for my bedroom, amazing deal

Reviews.Title: Great for what I needed.
Reviews.Author: Frog "<.<....>.>....0.0.....hi"
Reviews.Content: I have a small amount of space in my room that I could use for my tv, the old one I had for about, 12 years, it wasn't a samsung, but it worked great up until recently(it had a built in vhs player....it tried to eat the tapes), and it refused to pick up any channels or even connect to my 360 within the last few months. So I decided to find a new tv.I wanted something that would fit in the space I had, about 24 inches were available, and it had to have a good picture since I would use it for gaming, as well has being with in my budget. Looked around at all the stores in my area and nothing really fit the bill. So I came here to look around, found a few others that looked like they would work, but this is the one that I liked best.It came quickly, and I had it set up(almost) completly after opening it. The only thing that I didn't know about was that it had a built in scanner, or whatever it's called that allows you to pick up the channels if you don't have cable or satlilite. I had a converter box before, and so I had it set up with the box, and the TV wouldn't pick up any channels. My dad is the one that figured out that I didn't need the box and now I get more channels that I didn't before with my old tv and the box. So that's a plus.Pros:Great pictureGreat soundI got it at a great price!Easy set upEasy to get from TV to Gameing channels.Size is just right for meCons:That they didn't say that it had a built in analog signal detector thing. I spent like 2 hours trying to figure out why it didn't pick up channels.I definatly would say that others should get this tv, they come in other sizes besides this one. It's great and I'm very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Crummy sound and no usb video support
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought this set for my RV, in hopes that I wouldn't have to put a DVD player in as well.  The product decription states that plugging a thumb drive into the USB port allows access to videos, music and photos.  Well, it does not allow access to videos, and I confirmed this with Samsung.  This one is going back.

Reviews.Title: Best price for quality picture
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Great for a small location. I mounted this tv under my kitchen cabinet. Looks great, sounds good,and picture quality is excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby.
Reviews.Author: Job
Reviews.Content: Well first off the other reviews about the sound being terrible seem to be misleading, I had read them way after the fact of purchasing it and was surprised to find that it wasn't the case. The sounds and picture are really great for the size and price. I would definitely recommend for anyone on a budget or tight living quarters though it would also fit quite nicely in an office or at work. The only gripe I have is that there is no audio output, not a deal breaker but just a heads up.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Cannot see the picture when standing at an angle.Can only see when looking staight at it.We also have Sony and Mitsubishi in our home, andwe can see the picture from even the most severeangle.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom or office
Reviews.Author: Robert Burton Robinson - Fiction Writer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my home office. My exercise bike is in my office and at the end of the day I ride it while watching the news. Occasionally I watch some other type programming on it as well. The picture is great and so is the sound. I was surprised that a TV this thin could include speakers that would sound so good. I have it in the corner of a bookcase, so this probably helps direct the sound forward. I wouldn't be happy with this quality of sound for my main TV in the living room, but for a small set in my office it is perfect. And the sound is more than adequate for the music channels as well.I highly recommend it for bedrooms and other small rooms, especially if you plan to place it in a cabinet or against a wall so that  the sound will project.HOWEVER, as other reviewers have pointed out, this TV does not have audio outputs. This was not important to me, but if you are planning to hook this TV up to an audio system or even just powered speakers, you will be disappointed since there is no way to do it.

Reviews.Title: Work with the product - it's excellent
Reviews.Author: Neil Heller
Reviews.Content: No flat screen TV has adequate built-in audio.Samsung gives the user an equalizer that can bring the audio as close as should be expected.The video portion of the TV is excellent.If you're not going to mount the TV on the wall, use something (PC packing material is the best) to add bracing between the plastic stand and the bottom of the TV unit itself.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung
Reviews.Author: swanny
Reviews.Content: Such a great product. No matter which Samsung product I buy they never disappoint. Use it in the kitchen currently but would be cool to hook up to my computer eventually.The picture is perfect.Get this now

Reviews.Title: Good value overall
Reviews.Author: Canda
Reviews.Content: Great little TV and is working well with a simple indoor antenna. Sound is close to terrible, shame there is no sound out to get around the internal speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture - Poor Sound
Reviews.Author: Tom in North Florida
Reviews.Content: I gave this 3 stars because, although the 19" Samsung LED has a great picture, the sound is pretty poor.  I actually knew this from reading reviews prior to my purchase, but planned to add external speakers.  Unfortunately I was not able to do this successfully even with help from my electrical engineer brother.  Hooking up speakers in the only way possible (without an additional pre-amp) resulted in a continuous "hum".  The speakers I used (new) checked out fine hooked to another device.  I went back online and looked at reviews of other 19" LED TVs and the Toshiba 19L4200U was rated highly.  I purchased it, hooked up the speakers and all was good.  I have bought many products through Amazon and occasionally, as in this case, an item needs to be returned.  I have no problem with this since it is an easy process to do so.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Nice Picture and Sound.
Reviews.Author: BR69 "Randall"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Samsung 19 inch LED TV from an Amazon Seller about a month ago.So far, my TV works great, the picture and sound quality are excellent, and thesetup was simple. Hooked it up to Directv, the HD picture quality is awesome.My TV is just the right size for my bedroom, don't need no 50 inch TV here.For the low price I paid, under $160.00, this was a great deal. I've read othernegative reviews, haven't experienced anything negative about my TV at all.This is my honest review about the Samsung 19 inch LED HDTV, I highly recommendbuying one today.

Reviews.Title: This set didn't even last me a year
Reviews.Author: M. Rossy
Reviews.Content: My sister bought me this set earlier this year. February or March I think and it's already fritzing out. There's horizontal lines all over it and the sound always was terrible.I should have never thrown out my old tv set because now I do not have a tv or have the money to get one. I strongly recommend that no one buy this tv. I doubt that my sister can even get her money back on it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and great picture
Reviews.Author: Donald P. Mori
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for use in our kitchen/breakfast area.  It was very simple to set up and has a satisfactory viewing angle range and good quality sound.  If you're looking for a super performing TV with unsurpassed picture look elsewhere.  At 19" it has good resolution and works well in as utilitarian setting.

Reviews.Title: It's An OK TV
Reviews.Author: woofNbark
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound quality are OK.  My issue is that the stand that comes with it lets the screen tilt down, no matter how tight it is attached to the back of the TV.  I bought it because of the name since I've had Samsung products in the past.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: Fred Shatara
Reviews.Content: Just another throw-away product.  This one lasted exactly two years, then the picture went bad.  It never was great, but it was OK.  Then it became terrible and no adusting, resetting, or rebooting helped.  It's the first and last TV or anything else with the Samsung name on it that I'll ever buy.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Mufsmom
Reviews.Content: great picture and sound.  The screen is a bit small for viewing movies, but as a bedroom tv, it is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to game off of it. The tv quality is good, the volume on the remote is touchy(you have to tap the button if not the volume speeds). The only problem is the stand didn't come with any screws and no battery's for the remote.. Other than that it's a good tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Chuck "PC Guy"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a nice picture and feature set for the price.  The sound output isn't great and there are no options for audio out, but as a small TV to keep in our kitchen it's good enough.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Lydia Keough
Reviews.Content: Great screen size and color for a bedroom or kitchen. Easy install and lightweight. Highly recommend for a average size space.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp, much better than Emerson
Reviews.Author: Nelson J. Post "Jody"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung has a very clear picture, even when not used for HD viewing.  The 19" fits perfectly on top of the cable box under our overhead cabinets.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: William L. Wilson "BW"
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a very good tv.  It works well in our kitchen where a big screen it not needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice and small
Reviews.Author: BrooklynBlueShirt
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my kitchen.I  Always have company over for baseball and fottball games on sunday and figured it would be nice to have something for the crew that hangs around the fridge closer to the beer. Crisp picture.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: VICTORIA RYAN
Reviews.Content: great tv was well worth the money nice clarity color and sound slim design looks nice on stand easy to assemble

Reviews.Title: Our Alarm Clock
Reviews.Author: siddhartha
Reviews.Content: Great TV for our bedroom, at a terrific price.  The setup was explained well and straightforward.  The picture is fine and the features are just what we wanted.  It is hard to find an inexpensive TV these days with an on/off timer (not just a sleep timer).  We use it for our alarm clock; with 3 separate timers, it is easy to program different times and/or channels (usually weather channel) for different days.  A more civilized way to wake up.Overall, we are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: michelle aufderhaar
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my children,,they love that it has a great picture,its spacious and looks good. They are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Nice T.V.
Reviews.Author: 123KK
Reviews.Content: I also got the wall mount bracket and love it.I put this in our workoutroom for workout videos. The picture is so clear!It was also very easy to set up!

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jeff W. Biery
Reviews.Content: For a kitchen set it is fine.  When using the whole screen mode it tends to distort the picture.  So ordering the bigger tv actually was a bit dissappointing

Reviews.Title: Worked right out of the Box!
Reviews.Author: Vern Estes
Reviews.Content: Light weight, compact, picture perfect and this unit took less kitchen counter space than our 13 inch  that it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery, excellent product
Reviews.Author: Janet Neubecker
Reviews.Content: This tv was meant for a small room, so it's 19 inch size was a particular need.  Otherwise, it is really not something that can serve a big room.  Good quality, fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Flowergirl
Reviews.Content: The sound is just fine on this Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]the picture is great and the price was terrific.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound
Reviews.Author: Fr. Mark Niznik
Reviews.Content: Sound quality was even poorer than I imagined it would be.  There are settings to adjust, but to no avail.  Wouldn't recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not Internet Ready!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Gold Eagle Rise"
Reviews.Content: Amazon's product features first line states "internet ready".  This is NOT TRUE and is deceiving.  "Internet Ready" is why I bought the TV for my college student.  A disappointing Christmas day!  There are laws against false advertising.Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]

Reviews.Title: Pamela J
Reviews.Author: American Express
Reviews.Content: Excellent clear sharp picture.  Good value. I would buy another if I needed one.  Maybe I'll buy one next year for my daughter.  Bought it. For my husband's den.  He wishes I would have bought him a little larger screen but he's very happy while watching his football all by himself.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Pierre V Kieffer
Reviews.Content: Clear / crisp image from my std satellite receiver. Sound is tinny, but so what? I don't intend to do any serious viewing with it.

Reviews.Title: Good video not so good audio!
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Lyon
Reviews.Content: I can only rate this television as a being "okay". The image is quite good for a small monitor. The audio to me was unsatisfactory and there are no RCA audio out jacks and there is no headphone jack. You live with the built in speakers. I returned the television to AMAZON and purchased a different brand.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch LED HDTV perfect for apt living!!
Reviews.Author: Patsy J. Foster "marmretired"
Reviews.Content: TV is convenient for small space living.It will fit almost any where TV viewing is desired.Its versatility with the computer is a great feature!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: ASW
Reviews.Content: Great little TV for our bedroom! The sound is plenty loud- I tried it with the big Tv, fan, and a/c running and could hear it just fine. The picture is great and I mounted it on a swivel mount. I will say the sound quality is not as nice as a larger TV but that is to be expected. Also, I love the CC button on the remote and sleep timer!

Reviews.Title: 19in samsung
Reviews.Author: gail
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my office--very clear bright picture.looks good,works great.Good value purchase and perfect for a small room.It was a new purchase at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: B. Adams "BA"
Reviews.Content: Good HD picture and perfect size for our kitchen.  I comes with a stand but doesn't tilt, which would be nice.

Reviews.Title: It's amazing!
Reviews.Author: lange
Reviews.Content: First of all, I love the television. It works PERFECTLY and it is very easy to use. If I have to complain, the sound is not very loud. It is incredibly easy to assemble and easy to use for video games. Please get it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, quality picture
Reviews.Author: Madelyn Fischnar
Reviews.Content: I have come to rely on Samsung for great TV's.  This is the third one I have purchased and the quality and features are always exactly what I need.

Reviews.Title: 19" Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Eunice L. Pace "softysue"
Reviews.Content: This tv works perfect. I needed one for a small area, and this is it.Very lightweight and easy to move.

Reviews.Title: very nice tv
Reviews.Author: Loren C. Volkman
Reviews.Content: Our grandson is a tech for time warner and suggested the samsung for it's great picture quality. It has been a joy since we opened the box. First, it arrived about a week before it was promised and then, setting it up was easy and a great improvement over our old 15 inch tv in the kitchen. The only negative I can think of is that the auto channel program seems quite slow but I just step out of the room and  let it do it's thing. We love it.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: BR
Reviews.Content: Very clear sharp picture.  Sound quality is good.  Easy to mount on my existing swivel arm. Quality purchase, very pleased.

Reviews.Title: If you adjust the "custom" audio.........
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I love this little TV. It's a perfect fit in my computer room, where I wanted something small to watch from just a few feet away.Many have complained about the poor sound quality, which I'm sure is to be expected on sets of this size. But there IS a "custom" setting to the audio, which allows several different adjustments from high pitch to low, and in different configurations. After spending a few minutes tinkering with it, I have it where it's acceptable for everything I watch. The other settings for color and hue, also offer a good balance, in conjunction with the "standard, dynamic and theater" settings.Set up was a breeze. I use it with an outside antenna, and immediately scanned-in my 25 or so channels. Picks up both digital and analog signals.

Reviews.Title: 19" is smaller than I thought
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Pool "GLP"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, great sound and looks great. I purchased for bedroom amoire. I thought 19" would be the right size. Hmm....... 19" is smaller than it was in 1973! It'll work fine but probably would have bought a larger screen size if I had it to do over again.

Reviews.Title: Good, with a Couple of Limitations
Reviews.Author: Chappy4me
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a Sharp Aquos on the kitchen counter, a TV not connected to a cable box, only a cable outlet, so I wasn't looking for great quality but I am disappointed nonetheless. A very basic this TV doesn't have is the base can not tilt. The TV is very vertical and when I am at the counter, I like to be able to tilt it back. Silly, I know, but seems to me the base could have some moves. Also, maybe silly, but the TV is very short so the viewing angle is below my basic sight. I have it on a book for now until I can find some permanent perch. The TV might be better served on a mount, under a cabinet, to give it a better range of motion.The setup was okay, except I opted for auto and found it also loaded all the scrambled channels. Happily, there is a setup feature to remove all scrambled channels from the line up. I think for my needs the TV will be fine, once I position it more successfully.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: grammy
Reviews.Content: Got this Christmas 2012 for my daughter who wanted a small tv to put in her kitchen, she has it mounted on the wall so it can be seen in any direction, loves it and uses it more then her larger tv in the living room, said the picture and sound on this set is great.

Reviews.Title: Broken after a year
Reviews.Author: Kenneth C Williams
Reviews.Content: I liked the the size of the TV, perfect for in my kitchen. Like other reviews the sound is not that great, sometimes has that "Can echo" sound but is bearable. But after owning the set for 14 months the picture went out. I have digital lines going from top to bottom on about 2/3rds of the screen. I contacted Samsung a couple times and they said the set is "way out of warranty" and wouldn't agree to cover any repair costs.  I don't think 2 months beyond the standard 12 month warranty is anywhere near being way out of warranty. My previous Philips 13'' tube tv lasted 14 years before I bought this one. Not sure I want to invest more money with Samsung at this point

Reviews.Title: Good basic TV with all required input/output jacks
Reviews.Author: G English
Reviews.Content: I use this TV in my home office and have had it for many months with no issues.  Picture quality is above average, and has a headphone jack so I can route the sound to my Bose desktop speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for low end gaming
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for gaming. The max resolution is 1360x768 so it's good for low end PC gaming. The Game mode feature makes for a great lag time on both Xbox 360 and PC.

Reviews.Title: Great quality TV.
Reviews.Author: MarleneLouise
Reviews.Content: Bought this excellent TV for use in my kitchen area.  I can cook and bake while watching my favorite programs.  Just the right size to put on the counter with the thin, flat screen. The picture is clear and the sound is great.  It is hooked up to a satellite network.  I would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Nice Gift... 2 homes
Reviews.Author: DHOP
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this TV for me for my BDay. I wanted something for our camper so it has to be small. The camper had an HD amplified antenna in it. This TV has a great image and decent sound. We are amazed about how clear the picture is. On the off season we use the TV in our bedroom. We love it. Just a simple, good tv. 2012 model.Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL] (2011 Model)

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: dean devolpi
Reviews.Content: this is a good tv so far into it for about 9 months or so  happy with the quality, just wish it had one button sleep function.

Reviews.Title: TV turns on by itself at night
Reviews.Author: kikka hanazawa
Reviews.Content: It appears that this problem of TV going on and off has been very common for years, and I cannot believe Sumsang has not fixed it!

Reviews.Title: Working well after 2 years
Reviews.Author: Barnie
Reviews.Content: I have been satisfied with the quality of the picture and the sound.  The only complaint I have is the picture size adjustment.  It doesn't always let you make the picture adjustment, depending on what you are watching and sometimes things tend to be too big and exceed the screen.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Cathy Hinrichs
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, set-up was easy, even for a non-techy.  I found the stand sturdy and simple to put on, which I hadn't expected after reading the reviews.  The small size is perfect to alternate between our kitchen and a screened porch.  This was the smallest 19" TV I found, and I love Samsung.I bought this through Amazon Warehouse Deals and I'll definitely look for them again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has done it again.
Reviews.Author: devh "Diane"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this compact television is bright, crisp, and clear.  It's perfect for small rooms or close spaces.  Mine is near my bed.It's just right.

Reviews.Title: You won't be disappointed!
Reviews.Author: val
Reviews.Content: What a perfect little TV for our bedroom. The picture is excellent and because it's so small if fits nicely on my dresser. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Carmela Bottita "Carm"
Reviews.Content: Great picture easy to set up and settings guid was easy to follow.  The HD quality is is sharp. Enjoy

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]
Reviews.Author: James Barnett
Reviews.Content: We bought this televison because we have two others of this brand and we have been very satisfied with this companies products. We bought this for our daughters kitchen for her birthday. It well under the cabinets and allows her to watch the news etc while she prrpares meals for her family.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Janet L. Leinen
Reviews.Content: This TV has great picture and sound quality. worth the money spent.  My husband just loves it.. great purchase thanks

Reviews.Title: Good TV ,nice picture.
Reviews.Author: Betty Durocher
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this brand to anyone looking for a TV Samsung is a quality product. I feel I bought this at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: It was missing parts
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Johnston
Reviews.Content: I ordered this, through Amazon, but it came from Warehouse Deals. The Tv came without a power cord! Not a part you can do without. The picture is good, but the stand is unstable. It may work for a computer screen, but when assembled, the TV is not at 90 degrees from the base. It tilts down at about a 10degree angle. The Tv still wiggles when the base is fully tightened. I think it must really be intended for hanging on the wall only.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN 19D4003-Inch 720 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) (2011 Model)
Reviews.Author: Felix Reyes "Felix Reyes-Caribe"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent tv with very good picture.  Since it is small, it is a nice tv for those people looking for a tv to place it in a bedroom or kitchen.  Although I do not like black tvs, however I like it very much because I did not have other color choices.  So, I still give it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Amy Cawrse
Reviews.Content: This was really easy to mount to the wall...very thin and not too heavy.  The picture is amazing and we can see it even when sunlight hits it at times.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Aaron Davis
Reviews.Content: Got this flat screen for my son. He loves it.  The customer service was great.  Product arrived quicker than expected.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for small rooms
Reviews.Author: Frank Tucker
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our bedroom.  Great size to replace a 13" tube set.  Nice picture with tinny but acceptable sound.I wish the favorites button would just pop up a list of channels to choose from instead of requiring you to cycle through each one but that is a minor complaint.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19D4003. 19 Inch
Reviews.Author: Bernie Ackerman
Reviews.Content: The set up was very easy, and the picture is good,  The sound is not the best without speakers, but for a kitchen or small room, it is fine.

Reviews.Title: My new purchase
Reviews.Author: Danny Silva
Reviews.Content: This was the BEST purchase I've made so far. Just  wish I could've had more money to buy a bigger one, but that's ok

Reviews.Title: Great picture, sound's a bit tinny
Reviews.Author: James L. Van "JimV"
Reviews.Content: Overall, tho, great for my home office, and about $30 less than @ the local big box store.  With Prime, had it in 2 days

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kitchen
Reviews.Author: retired dentist
Reviews.Content: This is a  very nice little unit for a kitchen or office counter.  Good picture and nice quality.  Excellent sound.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Halderman "Robert C. Halderman"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for the bathroom, Works well with DirectTV, Nice looking TV and a Very cleen HD picture.BOB

Reviews.Title: Great for slideshows!
Reviews.Author: J. Lemons
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for the winery tasting room, a great way to showcase pictures - small enough to not be intrusive, but large enough to beautifully display pictures!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: M. Kuhn "fireman"
Reviews.Content: We put this on a wall mount in our kitchen/dining room.  With the expansive viewing angle, we can see it from both areas.  The picture and sound are great.  I have always had good experiences with Samsung TVs and this is no exception.

Reviews.Title: Small, light and great as a kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: E. Heyer "gas passer"
Reviews.Content: This is a small, light, inexpensive and good quality TV. This TV does not have the same quality picture as one with a better picture rating, but it serves my purpose as a TV in the kitchen when my wife and I are cooking.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: vicky
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear, sufficient volume even when the cooker hood and other appliances are making a lot of noise, great size for under the cabinet in the kitchen and the mount we use allows us to watch it from any angle. This tv can also be used as a computer monitor. However, it is not internet or wifi ready. As a basic led tv for general use, it cannot be faulted

Reviews.Title: Excellent small TV
Reviews.Author: M. L. Kunzler "skoobus"
Reviews.Content: Excellent small TV. Use it on the kitchen counter, perfect fit. Great color, great picture, 5 more words required??? Whatya want an editorial???

Reviews.Title: All Claims are True about the Samsung UN19D4003
Reviews.Author: echievements "echievements"
Reviews.Content: Perfect desktop TV...clear image...simple menu...this TV exceeds expectations. I wanted a desktop TV to watch Bloomberg.  ROKU + Samsung meet my needs.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for use in Nursing Home
Reviews.Author: S. J. Carlson
Reviews.Content: They only allow 19inch TV's and this was a good price. It has a great picture and is perfect for the use we bought it for. My 99 year old Mom has it in her room at the nursing home. Would have like to get a bigger one but they wouldn't allow it. This is great for the money. I would certainly purchase another if needed.

Reviews.Title: 19" Samsung
Reviews.Author: William J. Wright "W J Wright"
Reviews.Content: I got this for the size and weight. I really love the picture. It's a 2011 Model, but it's well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Dana "Dana"
Reviews.Content: Can't go wrong with Samsung.  We returned it, but only to get a bigger one.  19 inches was too small.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo Uplegger
Reviews.Content: I am using it as a kitchen TV and works very well. Compared to the previous old tv that I had this is a giant leap!

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG UN19D4003 19 INCH 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: G. R. Combs
Reviews.Content: Disappointed in its size. I have an older model 19" TV that is taller and has a bigger picture then this one. If I had seen it in a store, I would have definitely bought a bigger set. However, have no complaints about the quality of the picture or sound.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Products
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Frain
Reviews.Content: Always been very satisfied with Samsung products. Have recently purchased two TV'S and will be looking for another one in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Used- Like new = NEW
Reviews.Author: CaptainHappy
Reviews.Content: I bought this from amazon as "used-like new" and as far as I can tell the box had been open once or twice and resealed for re-sale.  It was still in the original packaging and the batteries for the remote were still in the original shrink wrap.

Reviews.Title: Replacement TV
Reviews.Author: kathyv
Reviews.Content: bought this to replace television in home office, so I wanted a small TV. Easy to set up, good picture and color. The base could be more sturdy, but is acceptable

Reviews.Title: It's cute and has the indicated size to my kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Spinetti
Reviews.Content: It's cute and has the indicated size to my kitchen, I just have the TV for cleaning or eating watching my favorite programs.

Reviews.Title: I think I forgot how small a 19" TV really is...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "teaganp"
Reviews.Content: The TV is mounted on the wall near my tub in my bathroom. It holds up well to the environment although I'm sure it's not rated to.  It is super little and very lightweight. It was easy to mount and has a decent picture, so no complaints.  It has a good sound quality coming out which is imporant if you are watching it with tub water running or listening to the news in the shower as in my case.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, well packaged, quick delivery. Sound can be adjusted, but seems a little high. Could use a bass adjustment. Very pleased overal with price and quality.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: vivijenn
Reviews.Content: I love this TV great image Samsung products are really good and great quality I am a Samsung fan ;-)

Reviews.Title: Superb TV
Reviews.Author: DJ Force X
Reviews.Content: Kitting out my apartment I bought one of its bigger brothers and was impressed with that I got a smaller screen for the kids room. I have had no issues with this TV, its picture quality is good, the sound is ok, but serves the purpose.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19 in HDTV
Reviews.Author: Busy Honey Bee "Busy Honey Bee"
Reviews.Content: The TV came in a very nice box that was not damaged. It was packaged very well. The TV was easy to set up with satellite and picked up all the stations that we have without my intervention. The picture is very clear and meets all expectations that I was looking for.Samsung is a good product no matter what is purchased.

Reviews.Title: So good, so far
Reviews.Author: PCTVman
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace a CRT bedroom TV.  It has a very good picture,to be expected for Samsung.  It was a bit smaller than I wanted, picture-wise but that's my fault for not measuring.Only downside, the channel search finds both the analog cable and  digital over air channels, but forces you to switch between cable and air to view both signal types.  The LG, I have puts them together.I added a small antenna with a VHF/UHF blocking combiner to pick up local low power HD channels in UHF and add them to the cable signal. The cable system doesn't use these UHF frequencies (channels), so there's no interferenceThere may be a way to watch both signal types without switching, but I haven't found it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung thin screen TV
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This is our third Samsung Thin Screen TV that we own. They are all excellant. Color is the best that we have found in any that we have seen. Amazon was great getting the TV and the wall mount to us in minimum time, also the price was the best.Chuck

Reviews.Title: As it should be.
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the price! The picture and sound are excellent.  It is easy to install and looks good anywhere.  I am enjoying it very much.Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV 19 in
Reviews.Author: cindy
Reviews.Content: When putting the tv on the stand it leaned forward and down.  There was no way to adjust this. The only way you could watch the tv was laying down.

Reviews.Title: Compact TV with Excellent Picture Quality + $35 Cheaper Here on Amazon vs. Fry's Electronics
Reviews.Author: Michael Gallagher
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to hang in my bathroom to watch the news as I get ready for work.  The picture is bright, sharp and crisp and is the perfect size for my bathroom.  The pricing here on Amazon was $164 vs. $199 for the same model of TV at my Houston area Fry's Electronics which made me even happier.  If you're looking for a smaller tv with a great picture and value, you can't go wrong with this one!If you're looking to hang this TV, I also bought - and recommend - this wall mount bracket: B000ID7QNI as it was $40 cheaper than Best Buy and very simple to install and mount to th eTV

Reviews.Title: Cute and Light Weight
Reviews.Author: aloha@hawaii
Reviews.Content: Am completely satisfied and the color is amazing. Perfect picture size for my needs. Clear Picture and HD excellent imaging.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated TV's
Reviews.Author: Andrew Daniluk
Reviews.Content: We had a ViewSonics 15" TV. We use this TV in the Kitchen. The tuner was so bad we had a hard time loading Channels 7 and 10 via antenna. Replacing it with the Samsung was like heaven. It always works. I believe it has a stronger tuner! We're believers in Samsung products. In addition to this 19" wonder, We have a 55" that is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Chet Wittkin
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived on time, and in perfect condition. I works great, and the reception is perfect. Mounted on the wall in bathroom.

Reviews.Title: extremely happy with samsung 19
Reviews.Author: pueblo1032
Reviews.Content: Have this product sitting on a kitchen cabinet. Sound quality questions? Folks it's a 19inch, sitting on a cabinet! Biggest surprise? That if the channel has an available HD feed from my cable company without a converter box, it will receive it on the set without any special adapters except a cable connection. My response to both SAMSUNG and COX CABLE, WOW! Needless to say, picture quality is excellent. Set up? A child could do it. I have a Samsung 52" LCD sitting in my living room. Being happy with the quality of that product led me to order the 19" LED. Small, thin, lightweight, and great picture quality, even on non-HD channels. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a nice small addition in a kitchen or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Speechless
Reviews.Content: This TV exceeded my expectations, given some of the reviews on here.  As far as the angle, that's easily fixed by just laying its box in its side and putting the TV on it. That's what I did at first, then  I set up a stand that rotates, and it puts the TV up at the perfect height, with my DVD player underneath.  I had trouble with the sound at first, too, but just adjusting it in the menu turned it into surround sound.  The picture quality is the best I've seen for a smaller TV.  The color was perfect out of the box, and I didn't even need to adjust it. So, I must admit that I don't know why it's getting any negative reviews.  I love this TV and would buy it again if I had another room to put it in!

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming
Reviews.Author: Wilder
Reviews.Content: At 19 inches, 720p is all you need. TV is great for console gaming. Samsung makes quality products; I have never had any problems with something made from Samsung..except their notebooks.

Reviews.Title: Samsung lcd led tv
Reviews.Author: jeff w
Reviews.Content: The Samsung lcd led sets work great in all locations from bright light to a dim lit rooms there a a good choice for where a small tv is needed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Lewis "clewisdvm"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television to be wall mounted in an exam room.  It is only hooked up to basic cable(no hD).  The picture is great and I have notice any sound issues other reviews commented on.

Reviews.Title: Even I Could Install It!!!
Reviews.Author: Elaine H.
Reviews.Content: Directions were clear, easy to follow, and the TV worked!  I find no problem with audio, but I'm not too picky.  This set is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture quality
Reviews.Author: Raymond M. Keil "R.Mark"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my patio, and it has a feature that allows you to make the screen very bright - which is a must for outdoor use (even on a covered patio).  Super good screen clarity.

Reviews.Title: Great price and awesome picture.
Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: Purchased two of these Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) for my kids when we upgraded the house to HD in every room. The kids were a little skeptical because of the small 19in. size, but they are really easy to see from across the room and the sound and picture quality are great. Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for a small space!
Reviews.Author: J. Stroud
Reviews.Content: Moved into a very small apartment with a very small bedroom.  The TV picture quality is excellent!  And I don't even have digital or high definition cable TV.  It gives me a great picture on DVD movies.  This is a very good value for small spaces.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: CV
Reviews.Content: You get what you are paying for. suitable for small room, clear picture with great features, perfect to move around with

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED model 2011
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The sound is really low, the pic is ok.  I will have to buy a sound booster. I think the pic is TOO horizontal.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound
Reviews.Author: Pelar
Reviews.Content: This was our third Samsung Tv purchased from Amazon. We were expecting the same quality as the other two, a 46" and 55". Both were excellent, in picture  and sound. The 19" picture was very good but the sound was poor. You have to keep the volume at max to hear it. We ended up sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Samsung does not sing
Reviews.Author: Denise Wright "Nikki"
Reviews.Content: Lack of audio output makes this TV a joke - useless if you want external sound. We do not recomend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 19" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Barbara Smarsh "Barb"
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for my kitchen!  Picture is nice and speakers are fine.  I don't have any negative things to say about it.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: N. Pervez
Reviews.Content: We needed a TV to fit a built in Cabinet in bathroom. This is the perfect size and a good TV too!

Reviews.Title: TV Stand Worthless
Reviews.Author: FLG
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, sound is not-so-good, and if you plan on using the stand that comes with this TV, you'll find it supported just by two small screws, very flimsy. Tried several strategies to tighten the screws to a snug, non-wobbly fit. Just poor quality. I'm very disappointed in Samsung for producing a stand like this to go with their usually great product. The TV simply won't stand safely and I don't want to have to mount a 19" TV.

Reviews.Title: Audio From Internal Speakers Are Just Acceptable
Reviews.Author: Laurence K
Reviews.Content: The audio from TV in larger room might be unacceptable for many people.  There are no audio out jacks on the TV, so I bought external speakers (Logitechs) and grab audio from my cable box which has audio out jacks (I use the RCAs).  Sound via the external speakers are great.  LED do have the problem that one needs to view video directly in front to have best quality (if you view from side or above or below the video is poor (especially color).  But, all LEDs are that way.  I prefer the old Cathode Ray Tubes, but can't buy CRTs very easily.  My old Sony CRT has much better video quality, IMHO

Reviews.Title: good little set
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: great little set, clear, sharp, i gave it 4 stars only because its not a full 1080 set. easy set up good color

Reviews.Title: Shocked at Samsung
Reviews.Author: C. KEEFE
Reviews.Content: I was shocked at Samsung for having a TV that did not work.  I have five Samsung TVs in my house with no issues.  I reorder a Samsung again and wilthout a hesitation.  I knew I was in for trouble when the box came re-sealed finger prints on the screen too.  I knew it was a returned product and they ( Amazon) sent it back out.  I sent it back to Amazon within 24 hours.  I give two stars only because Amazon sent out a defective product.  I know Amazon will make good on any product they sell, not an issue.

Reviews.Title: Bad picture distortion
Reviews.Author: R. Dejernett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor as a replacement for my 9 yeal old Dell computer.  The Samsung has a letter box configuration which is NOT compatible with older computers.  The image was stretched out and was unacceptable.  It was mounted on a flimsy base and the controls were hard to access.  I returned it and purchased a Dell monitor which worked perfectly and was of better design and quality.

Reviews.Title: Sansung UN19D4003 HDTV
Reviews.Author: bob carl
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN19D4003 HDTV After ordering the 32 in HDTV,  I felt I needed  a smaller TV  for use in  the home office.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for bedroom use
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty nice TV for me to put it in my bedroom, so that I would not miss any TV shows.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Holly A. Kimmy
Reviews.Content: I was getting this monitor for home after we had gotten large monitors at work and realized how nice they were. This has been a horrible experience from the word go. The cables they sent with the monitor are not compatible with anything laptop, desktop nada.... I have yet to see anything on my 19 inch screen but check video monitor. HP technical support had me purchase 2 incorrect replacement cables to get this to attach to my laptop as an additional monitor. Even one star is too many.

Reviews.Title: Can't get an order correct
Reviews.Author: Verry Unhappy with Amazon
Reviews.Content: I ordered this 19" LED TV and an under the cabinet mounting bracket for the TV. Received the package only to find when I opened it I had gotten a WII Fitness Plus system and game. I immediately contacted customer service only to find out they will resend the TV but only credit me for the bracket. I've been employed in a shipping department some time ago and can't accept this kind of service for such a simple order. This will be my last purchase from this site.

ProductInfo.Features:
720p Resolution
1 USB (JPEG/MP3)
Tabletop stand included
Clock & On/Off Timer,Sleep Timer
Power Requirements :110 VAC, 60 Hz,Standby.Power Consumption : < 1W
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN19D4003 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL] (2011 Model)
